src_original: tena khalu samayena trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau pañcamātraiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyavaharamāṇau,  tasminn eva mārge adhvapratipannāv abhūtām;  atha trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor anyatamāyāḥ purāṇamitrāmātyajñātisālohitāyāḥ devatāyāḥ etad abhavat:  ayaṃ buddho bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddho vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī saptāham ekaparyaṅkenātināmayati;  na cainaṃ kaśit piṇḍakena pratipādayati;
tgt_original: 』時適有五百賈人，從山一面過，車牛皆躓不行。

src_original: taṃ trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau tatprathamataḥ pratipādayetām;  tat syāt trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;  yanv ahaṃ svayam evautsukyam āpadayeya yaduta bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātapradānasya hetor iti;  atha sā devatā sarvaṃ karvaṭakam udāreṇāvabhāsena sphāritvā trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijāv idam avocat:
tgt_original: 中有兩大人，一名提謂，二名波利，怖還與眾人俱詣樹神請福，神現光像言：

src_original: vaṇijau vaṇijau ayaṃ buddho bhagavān uribilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddho vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī;  saptāham ekaparyaṅkenātināmayati;  nainaṃ kaścit piṇḍakena pratipādayati;
tgt_original: 『今世有佛，在此優留國界尼連禪水邊，未有獻食者。

src_original: taṃ yuvāṃ tatprathamataḥ piṇḍakena pratipādayatam;  tad yuvayor bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
tgt_original: 汝曹幸先能有善意，必獲大福。

src_original: ityuktvā sā devatā tatraivāntarhitā; (SBV I 123)  atha trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor etad abhavat:
tgt_original: 』賈人聞佛名，皆喜言：

src_original: na batāvaro buddho bhaviṣyati;  nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam;  yatredānīṃ devatā api tasya bhagavata autsukyam āpadyante yaduta piṇḍapātapratipādanahetoḥ;
tgt_original: 『佛必獨大尊，天神所敬，非凡品也。

src_original: iti viditvā prabhūtaṃ madhu ca manthāś ca ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntau;  upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthātām;  ekāntasthitau trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijāv idam avocatām:  ihāvābhyāṃ bhadanta bhagavantam uddiśya prabhūtaṃ madhu ca manthāś ca ānītāḥ;
tgt_original: 』即和󰉓蜜，俱詣樹下，稽首上佛。

src_original: tān bhagavān pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya iti;  atha bhagavata etad abhavat:  na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ pāṇau piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāṃ,  tadyathā anyatīrthikaḥ;  yanv ahaṃ samanvāhareyam kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
tgt_original: 「佛念先古諸佛哀受人施法皆持鉢，不宜如餘道人手受食也。

src_original: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti:  pātre bhadanta pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;  bhagavato 'pi samanvāhṛtya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate pātre pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;  tatra bhagavataḥ pātreṇa pātrakāryam utpannam;  atha catvāro mahārājā bhagavataḥ pātreṇa pātrakāryam utpannam iti viditvā anyatamasmāt
tgt_original: 時四天王，即遙知佛當用鉢，如人屈申臂頃，俱到頞那山上；

src_original: pāṣāṇaparvatāc catvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇy amanuṣyakṛtāny amanuṣyaniṣṭhitāny acchāni  śucīni niṣpratigandhāny ādāya,
tgt_original: 如意所念，石中自然出四鉢，香淨潔無穢。

src_original: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;  upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;  ekāntasthitāś catvāro mahārājā bhagavantam idam avocan:
tgt_original: 四天王各取一鉢，還共上佛： 『願哀賈人，令得大福。

src_original: saced aham ekasya mahārājasyāntikād ekaṃ pātraṃ pratigrahīṣyāmi,  trayāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati cetaso 'nyathātvam;  saced dvayor,  dvayor bhaviṣyati cetaso 'nyathātvam;  sacet trayāṇām ekasya bhaviṣyati cetaso (SBV I 124)
tgt_original: 』佛念取一鉢不快餘三意，便悉受四鉢，累置左手中，右手按之，合成一鉢，令四際現。

src_original: tena khalu samayena nairaṃjanāyā mahodakavāhaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ;  atha bhagavān sādhikapauruṣeṇodakaskandhena parikṣipto reṇuhate 'bhyavakāśe caṃkramati;  athorubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyaitad abhavat:
tgt_original: 』「時尼連禪水，長流駃疾，佛以自然神通，斷水令住，使水隔起，高出人頭，令底揚塵，佛行其中。

src_original: tathā prāsādiko mahāśramaṇaḥ;  mā haivodakavāhena hṛto bhaviṣyati iti mahāśramaṇaṃ samanveṣiṣyāmīty ekavṛkṣikāṃ (SBV I 228)  nāvam adhirohan bhagavantaṃ samanveṣati;
tgt_original: 迦葉恐佛為水所漂，即與弟子俱，乘船索佛。

src_original: adrākṣīd urubilvākāsyapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ sādhikapauruṣeṇodakaskandhena parikṣiptaṃ reṇuhate 'bhyavakāśe caṃkramantam;
tgt_original: 迦葉見水隔斷，中央塵起，佛行其間。

src_original: jīvasi mahāśramaṇa;
tgt_original: 『大道人乃尚活耶？

src_original: jīvāmi kāśyapa;
tgt_original: 』佛言： 『然，吾自活耳。

src_original: adhirokṣyasi mahāśramaṇa ekavṛkṣikāṃ nāvam;
tgt_original: 『欲上船不？ 』佛言：

src_original: atha bhagavata etad abhavat:
tgt_original: 』佛念：

src_original: yanv ahaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyābhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskuryāṃ yathā samāhite citte yathodakam eva ekavṛkṣikāṃ nāvam adhiroheyam;
tgt_original: 『今當現神，令子心伏。

src_original: athorubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyaitad abhavat:  āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramaṇo mahānubhāvaḥ;
tgt_original: 迦葉復念： 『是大沙門，神則神矣，然不如我已得羅漢也！
